data.message: My friend facebook account use more then 10 years but facebook suddenly disable it , i need help

replies.message: Hi Matthew. Here are a few reasons your friend's account may have been disabled: http://bit.ly/2zHIqL1. If they believe that it was disabled by mistake, they can submit an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2AOmN8C. -Kiara

Hi there , my friend facebook account joanneteoh_3830@yahoo.com have been use for more then 10 years , inside have a lot of memory , my friend facebook account been disable like that , she keep crying can facebook team help .....
